org.fridlund.backman.entities

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.EntityAbstract
      • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.MovableEntityAbstract
        • org.fridlund.backman.entities.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.Entity, org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.MovableEntityInterface

    public class Ghost
extends org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.MovableEntityAbstract
    Simple ghost AI, Chooses a random direction of the ones accessible (except the one from it came), when it collides with a wall.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Assigns the width and the hight of the ghost based on the graphics loaded. Here is also the tiles allowed for the ghosts to walk on are defined.
